thread.title: Red Hat Releases Beta Builds of Developer Toolset 4 and Software Collections 2.1
thread.title_full: Red Hat Releases Beta Builds of Developer Toolset 4 and Software Collections 2.1 - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Red Hat Releases Beta Builds of Developer Toolset 4 and Software Collections 2.1
text: On October 15, the Red Hat Enterprise Linux team was proud to announce the release of the Beta builds for their open source Red Hat Software Collections 2.1 project, a collection of web development tools, databases, and dynamic languages, and Red Hat Developer Toolset 4, which helps developers to streamline app development on Red Hat Enterprise Linux. Among the new features implemented in Red Hat Software Collections 2.1 Beta, we can mention Varnish Cache 4.0.3, an open-sou... Â»
